contents: Article 2 (Definition) ① The definitions of terms used in these regulations are as follows. Revised on May 4, 2023. 1. Players refer to players, coaches, referees, and players in charge of management. 2. Athlete refers to a person who has registered with the relevant member sport organization for the purpose of athlete activities such as participation in competitions. 3. Leader refers to a person who has registered for the purpose of serving as a leader of the relevant member sport organization. 4. Referee refers to a person registered for the purpose of refereeing activities for the relevant member sport organization. 5. Athlete manager refers to a person other than an athletic instructor who manages athletes for their physical strength and health and is registered for the purpose of serving as an athlete manager for the relevant member sport organization. 6. Registration refers to registering in the athlete registration system according to established procedures in the hope of working as a player, coach, referee, or player manager for the relevant sport of a member sport organization. 7. Registration change refers to the athlete changing the information registered in the athlete registration system, such as affiliation or registration location. 8. Activities refer to activities such as participation in various competitions as a player, coach, referee, or player manager of the relevant sport. 9. Affiliation refers to an organization or institution to which a player belongs to carry out activities. 10. The transfer consent form refers to a form that indicates the consent of the head of the affiliated organization prior to the change when a player changes affiliation. 11. An athletics department refers to an athletics department at a school or workplace, etc., comprised of athletes. 12. Workplace athletics department refers to an athletics department operated by the head of a workplace through an employment contract with athletes. 13. Sports club refers to a corporation or organization operated for the regular sports activities of its members, including athletes. 14. Sports club refers to a sports club composed of athletes for the purpose of daily sports activities. 15. Related organizations refer to sports organizations specified in items a to c of Article 2, Paragraph 9 of the National Sports Promotion Act. ② In these regulations, when the age standard for registration of a player is expressed as age, ㅇㅇ years or older means from January 1 of the year in which the player becomes that age, and ㅇㅇ or younger means until December 31 of the year in which he or she becomes that age. says Newly established 2023. 5. 4.
